main event: Radar detection of a single unidentified object at Tinker AFB, Oklahoma on October 8, 1954
interesting points: The object exhibited unusual flight characteristics, such as approaching, turning around, and disappearing on the radar display
The radar return was determined to be caused by a person signal rather than a single target
Multiple references were made to similarities with
The report includes an air intelligence information report on the observation of luminous objects at Tinker AFB
The report appears to be part of the Project Blue Book UFO investigation documents
sighted object: single unidentified object detected on radar
